Actions.Name: Battle Brew
Actions.Description: The Brewer swigs a battle brew. Roll 1d6. The brew has random effects. When the Brewer picks up a valuables token, this ability recharges. Duplicate results instead move the result up by 1 category (from 2-3 to 4-5 for example).

Rolls.Description: Brew explodes in a blast 1 area effect centered on the brewer, dealing [D]+[fray] with true strike to everyone (including the Brewer!)
Brewer gains counter for the rest of combat. Re-roll if they already have counter.
Brewer become sturdy for the rest of combat and gains vigor 1.
Brewer becomes unstoppable for the rest of combat and gains vigor 1.
Brewer's attacks are critical hits for the rest of combat.
